title: Orbis
description: Orbis is an artificially created planet where the top layers consist of a beautiful trade city and the bottom layers consist of the planet's criminal unground.

title: Magic
description: The energy the binds all life.

title: Zirconian
description: Zirconians are a race known for being harsh, stern and none emotional. Their government is cold and controlling. There physical characteristics consist of human like bodies with varying shades of blue skin.
